analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/17/0x74902714d325e794f50f7e07bd802aa61b5f450d.sol:
	Contract BBToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/17/0x74902714d325e794f50f7e07bd802aa61b5f450d.sol#154)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
